metaTags.metaDescription: See all announcements and press releases for CIOs during CIO Week 2023!

relatedBlades.title: CIO Week 2023
relatedBlades.subtitle: Learn how Cloudflare helps CIOs navigate their high-stakes, strategic digital transformation initiatives.

features.title: Cloudflare Announces New Solutions to Help CIOs Maximize Employee Collaboration and Productivity
features.description: Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE: NET), the security, performance, and reliability company helping to build a better Internet, today announced Cloudflare Digital Experience Monitoring, an all in one dashboard that helps CIOs understand how critical applications and Internet services are performing across their entire corporate network. Cloudflare Digital Experience Monitoring, part of Cloudflare's Zero Trust platform, will provide IT leaders with predictive, historical, and real time intelligence around application outages, network issues, and performance slow-downs to keep employees productive wherever they are working.

features.title: Cloudflare Announces Magic WAN Connector to Speed Up, Simplify, and Secure How Any Business Connects to the Internet
features.description: Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE: NET), the security, performance, and reliability company helping to build a better Internet, today announced Magic WAN Connector, the open source software-defined software package that makes it easier than ever for any business to connect and secure their entire corporate network with Cloudflare. With Magic WAN Connector, Cloudflare One is now a true integrated SASE security and networking solution to protect and accelerate the performance of enterprise devices, applications, and networks. Additionally, Cloudflare announced new participants in the Network On-Ramp partner program as well as OEMs to give customers flexibility and freedom of choice no matter how they connect to Cloudflare's network.

features.title: Press Release- Cloudflare Announces Comprehensive Email Security & Data Protection Tools to Help Secure Enterprises Against Phishing Attacks
features.description: Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE: NET), the security, performance, and reliability company helping to build a better Internet, today announced several new Zero Trust email security solutions, compatible with any email provider, to protect employees from multichannel phishing attacks, prevent sensitive data being exfiltrated via email, and help businesses speed up and simplify deployments. Now, Cloudflare is providing organizations with its simple and robust phishing and malware protection that is deeply integrated with its Zero Trust platform, helping to secure all of an organization's applications and data.

features.title: Cloudflare Expands Relationship with Microsoft, Makes Industry Leading Zero Trust Security Tools Easier than Ever to Deploy
features.description: Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE: NET), the security, performance, and reliability company helping to build a better Internet, today announced an expansion of its relationship with Microsoft to help customers easily deploy, automate, and enhance their organization's Zero Trust security.

features.title: Welcome to CIO Week 2023
features.description: This CIO Week we'll demonstrate how Cloudflare is helping CIOs keep data, devices and employees both safe and fast across hybrid and remote environments.  We'll show how Cloudflare accelerates digital transformation and modernizes networking and security towards a Zero Trust model.

features.title: Introducing Digital Experience Monitoring
features.description: With Digital Experience Monitoring, we've set out to build the tools you need to quickly find the needle in the haystack and resolve issues related to performance and connectivity.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a woman monitoring a dashboard

features.title: Cloudflare is faster than Zscaler
features.description: Cloudflare is 38-55% faster at delivering Zero Trust experiences than Zscaler. Let's talk about why that is and how we found that out

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a stopwatch and data

features.title: Weave your own global, private, virtual Zero Trust network on Cloudflare with WARP-to-WARP
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce a new way to use Cloudflare WARP to securely connect to and from any device in your Zero Trust deployment simply running WARP.

features.title: Bring your own certificates to Cloudflare Gateway
features.description: Security and IT administrators can now bring their own custom certificates to encrypt user side connections for Zero Trust.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a padlock, charts and graphs, and a fingerprint

features.title: Announcing the Authorized Partner Service Delivery Track for Cloudflare One
features.description: This week, we're announcing the Authorized Services Delivery Partner Track (ASDP) designed to validate partners that want to deliver services around Cloudflare One

features.title: Why do CIOs choose Cloudflare One?
features.description: Today, over 10,000 organizations trust Cloudflare One to connect and secure their users, devices, applications, and data. As part of CIO Week, we spoke with the leaders of some of our largest customers to better understand why they selected Cloudflare

imageAssetFile.altText: Why CIO's choose Cloudflare One over the competition
imageAssetFile.title: Why CIO's choose Cloudflare One over the competition

features.title: Cloudflare protection for all your cardinal directions
features.description: In this post, we'll recap how definitions of corporate network traffic have shifted and how Cloudflare One provides protection for all traffic flows, regardless of source or destination.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cardinal Directions East, West, North, South and network traffic
imageAssetFile.title: Cardinal Directions East, West, North, South and network traffic

features.title: Announcing the Magic WAN Connector: the easiest on-ramp to your next generation network
features.description: Cloudflare is making it even easier to get connected with the Magic WAN Connector: a lightweight software package you can install in any physical or cloud network to automatically connect, steer, and shape any IP traffic.

imageAssetFile.altText: Magic WAN Connector (buy our box or BYO)
imageAssetFile.title: Magic WAN Connector (buy our box or BYO)

features.title: Preview any Cloudflare product today
features.description: Enterprise customers can now start previewing non-contracted services with a single click in the dashboard. Find out how.

imageAssetFile.altText: Try any Cloudflare One product right now
imageAssetFile.title: Try any Cloudflare One product right now

features.title: Announcing Custom DLP profiles
features.description: Cloudflare's Data Loss Prevention (DLP) service now offers the ability to create custom detections, so that organizations can inspect traffic for their most sensitive data.

features.title: Network detection and settings profiles for the Cloudflare One agent
features.description: Cloudflare's device client (WARP) can now securely detect pre-configured locations and route traffic based on the needs of the organization for that location.

features.title: New ways to troubleshoot Cloudflare Access 'blocked' messages
features.description: Investigate 'allow' or 'block' decisions based on how a connection was made with the same level of ease that you can troubleshoot user identity.

features.title: Email Link Isolation - your safety net for the latest phishing attacks
features.description: Email Link Isolation is your safety net for the suspicious links that end up in inboxes and that users may click. This added protection turns Cloudflare Area 1 into the most comprehensive email security solution when it comes to protecting against phishing attacks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Area 1 + Browser Isolation to secure links in email
imageAssetFile.title: Area 1 + Browser Isolation to secure links in email

features.title: Press Release- Cloudflare Announces Comprehensive Email Security & Data Protection Tools to Help Secure Enterprises Against Phishing Attacks
features.description: Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE: NET), the security, performance, and reliability company helping to build a better Internet, today announced several new Zero Trust email security solutions, compatible with any email provider, to protect employees from multichannel phishing attacks, prevent sensitive data being exfiltrated via email, and help businesses speed up and simplify deployments. Now, Cloudflare is providing organizations with its simple and robust phishing and malware protection that is deeply integrated with its Zero Trust platform, helping to secure all of an organization's applications and data.

features.title: How Cloudflare CASB and DLP work together to protect your data
features.description: Coming in early 2023, Cloudflare Zero Trust will introduce capabilities between our CASB and DLP services that will help organizations strengthen their data security. Administrators will be able to peer into the files stored in their SaaS applications and identify sensitive data inside them.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a shield with an arrow

features.title: How Cloudflare Area 1 and DLP work together to protect data in email
features.description: Cloudflare is combining capabilities from Area 1 Email Security and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to provide complete data protection for corporate email. This includes coverage for use cases such as preventing egress of cloud email data, enforcing data security between partners, protecting against ransomware and malicious links, and preventing passive data loss.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a paper airplane and email security

features.title: One-click data security for your internal and SaaS applications
features.description: Secure sensitive data by running application sessions in an isolated browser â€“ now with just one click. Running users sessions in an isolated browser allows administrators to apply controls that prevent the leak of sensitive data, including restricting copy/paste, downloads, and more.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a log in screen and a shield

features.title: Improved Access Controls: API Access can now be selectively disabled.
features.description: Cloudflare is making it easier for account owners to view and manage the access their users have on an account by allowing them to restrict API access to the account.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of charts and graphs with a magnifying glass

features.title: Announcing SCIM support for Cloudflare Access & Gateway
features.description: Cloudflare Access & Gateway now support the System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) protocol.

imageAssetFile.altText: Access SCIM makes user and group management easier
imageAssetFile.title: Access SCIM makes user and group management easier

features.title: Cloudflare Expands Relationship with Microsoft, Makes Industry Leading Zero Trust Security Tools Easier than Ever to Deploy
features.description: Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE: NET), the security, performance, and reliability company helping to build a better Internet, today announced an expansion of its relationship with Microsoft to help customers easily deploy, automate, and enhance their organization's Zero Trust security.

features.title: Expanding our Microsoft collaboration: proactive and automated Zero Trust security for customers
features.description: As CIOs navigate the complexities of stitching together multiple solutions, we are extending our collaboration with Microsoft to create one of the best Zero Trust solutions available.

features.title: API-based email scanning
features.description: Customers can now onboard O365 domains to Area 1, adding more flexibility on deployment methods.

features.title: New: Scan Salesforce and Box for security issues
features.description: Cloudflare CASB adds two new SaaS integrations for Salesforce and Box.

imageAssetFile.altText: CASB integrations for  Box Salesforce OneDrive
imageAssetFile.title: CASB integrations for  Box Salesforce OneDrive

features.title: Zone Versioning is now generally available
features.description: Safely configure and deploy updates to zone configuration with Zone Versioning now Generally Available for Enterprise customers

features.title: Cloud CNI privately connects your clouds to Cloudflare
features.description: Customers using Google Cloud Platform, Azure, Oracle Cloud, IBM Cloud, and Amazon Web Services can now open direct connections from their private cloud instances into Cloudflare

imageAssetFile.altText: Privately connect from Cloudflare to AWS, GCP, Azure, Oracle, IBM
imageAssetFile.title: Privately connect from Cloudflare to AWS, GCP, Azure, Oracle, IBM

features.title: China Express: Cloudflare partners to boost performance in China for corporate networks
features.description: China Express is a suite of connectivity and performance offerings designed to improve application performance for users in China.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One in China - CMI and China Express updates
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One in China - CMI and China Express updates

features.title: Cloudflare Application Services for private networks: do more with the tools you already love
features.description: Today, we're excited to announce new integrations that make it possible to unlock operational and cost efficiencies for IT teams by allowing them to do more with fewer tools, and enable new use cases that are impossible without Cloudflare's  "every service everywhere" architecture.

imageAssetFile.altText: MWAN + Reverse-Proxy (L7 core) supports private origin IP
imageAssetFile.title: MWAN + Reverse-Proxy (L7 core) supports private origin IP

features.title: Give us a ping. (Cloudflare) One ping only
features.description: Now Zero Trust administrators can use the familiar debugging tools that we all know and love like ping, traceroute, and MTR to test connectivity to private network destinations running behind their Tunnels

features.title: Cloudflare Zero Trust for managed service providers
features.description: Adding new features to Cloudflare Zero Trust for Managed Service Providers using Gateway DNS.

features.title: CIO Week 2023 recap
features.description: Learn about all the new products, partnerships, and innovations Cloudflare announced during CIO Week to help organizations modernize their IT and security.
